div.p: Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xjo die mensis augusti anno quo supra

The said' day Williame scrimgeour ane of the Officiaris of the saide burghe at commavnde of the
prouest and balyeis chargit Johne craik with his wande of office to remane within the saide
tolbutht quhile he pait to Symonde ellone or his procuratoris the thridpart of the iiijxx stanis of
wole eftir the tenor of the actis maide tharapone obefor Ande sone thareftir at command of the
saide prouest and balyeis the said' officiar' chargit patrik rede to remane within the saide tolbutht
quhile he pait ane vthir thridpart of the saide iiijxx stanis of wol to the saide Symon'
or his procuratoris

The said' day Jonhne craik offerit him redy to pay his partof the iiijxx stanis of wole optenit
him patry red' and mathow branche eftir the tenor of the actis maid' tharapon' obefor

The said' day patry Rede and Jonhne craik allegit that thai hed' nay wole to the pament of
the iiijxx stanis optenit one thame and mathow branche obefor tharfor thai offerit
redy to present and deliuer to the balyeis thar gudis Sufficient to be comprisit for the
pament of thar part of the saide iiijxx stanis of wole one the morne hereftir Ande thareftir
and balyeis licencit the saide patry and Jonhne to pas' Saiflie out of the saide burghe tolbutht to /
monunday that next Cumis that day tile entir thar personis agane within the samyn and the
saide wole be vnpait and thar' gudis nocht schevin present strenyeabile for the said' wole same
kile as pertenis to thar part

The said' day the borghe' fundin one androw Crokar' for the brekin of patry Walcaris
scher' was fundin availe be ane Suorne assis' William Wormet forspekar for the quhilkis
the saide Androw was in Amerciament of the court and aw to mend' the saide scheir' et cetera as law wile
and forbeir' in tyme to Cum et cetera and mak it als' gude as it was quhen he Intromettit
with It and recompens' him the skath done to him

The said' day the borghe fundin one Johne Williamsone alexander thekar alexander Williamsone and Williame
surd' for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of his part of ane dusane of lax et cetera extending
to viij s' was fundin of nayn availe be ane Suorne assis' Adnrow Cullane forspekar
for the quhilkis the saide Jonhne was in Amerciament of the Court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdme xij die Au
gusti anno quo Supra

The saide day Dauid grig one that ane part Ande androw litstar one that vthir
part Oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis tile abid' and stande at the finale
decret and ordinance of Johne Cullane and vthir personis et cetera quhilkis riplie
auisit ordanit the saide Dauid tile ask the saide Androw forgiwnes et cetera Ande
gif euire at the saide Dauid offeendis to the saide Androw or ony barnis of
the saide Alane litstar and beis conuict' tharof sale pay x merkis to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin And' in likuis' gif euir the saide Androw offendis to the
saide Dauid or to his fadir or ony barnis of his and beis conuict' tharof Sale pay x
merkis to the said' kirk werk vnforgevin et cetera

The said' day the borghe' fundin be alexander malison one William blith and Sandy lammynton' for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of hidis and skinnis extending to xxiij s' of sic
lik price as he hed' thame obefor et cetera be ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullan
forspekar for the quhilkis the saide William and alexander was in Amerciament of the court
ans aw to gif him hidis skinnis for sic price as obefor for xxiij s'

The saide day Canny Dunde was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' for
trubulance of Norman leslie officiar' Johne Cullane forspekar for the
quhilkis scho was in Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and
forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera Ande atour it was it was ordanit be the assis'
that gif euire the saide Agnes offednis to the said' norman or ony vthir
officiar' in tyme to Cum and beis conucit' tharof scho sale pay x merkis to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo quarto die mensis
Augusti Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo Octauo

The said day Willeame Scrimgeoure officiar at command of the Prouoist
and bailyeis chargit patry reid and Johnne craik to Remain within the tolbutht
quhill thai pait be thame self and complicis four scoyr stanis of woll to Symon'
Ellone eftir the tenor of the Actis gane obefor And thareftir chargit Robert Reid'
and alexander Kintor be his wand' of office to remain within the said tolbutht quhill
thai relevit the said patry Johnne and mathoue branche of thar part of the said iiijxx
stanis of woll eftir the tenor of the actis maid tharapone obefor'

The said day Dauid futhes and Johnne portar lauchfullie warnit be the
officiar callit and nocht comperit till haue fred and relevit patry reid Johnne craik
and mathou branche of thar part of four scoir stanis of woll at the handis
of Symon Elloun' was in amerciament of the court in defalt of presence

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimooctauo die
mensis Augusti Anno quo supra

The said day Katherin hay the wif of Alexander crag' deponit be hir aitht
that the ring land' be hir in wed to Johnne piperis wif was wortht v s' quhilkis
the bailyeis chargeit hir to pay the said v s' witin terme of lawe

The said day comperit Androw litster and offerit him reddy till ansuer' to the
borght fundin one him be Johnne of cullan for the wranguis' Intrometting
with tua barrellis of Salmond' et cetera Ande becaus the said Johnne comperit
nocht he protestit to be quyt of his chalang vnto the tyme he was newly per/
sewit

Curia balliuoum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The said' day Androw fif lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer'
to the borghe' fundin one him be Williame Wormet for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of demi vnicorne and j li' wax price iiij s' tharfor the balyeis chargit William
scrimgeour officiar' to pas' and tak ane streis' of the saide Androw and lat it agane
to borghe' and It be askit and warne him to Comper this day xv dais tile
ansuer' to the said' borghe as thrid' day of proces'

The saide day the balyeis chargit moscrope to remane within the
tolbutht quhile he fand' Sufficient Souerte to pay tile nory
tuentj s' betuix this and this day viii dais for the price of ane barrele of
grils'

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Johne andirsone be Duncane craik
that he awe to releiwe him of ij estlande burdis follouit Dauid andirsone
was fundin of nayn' availe be ane Suorne assis' Duncan fyf forspekar for
the quhilkis the said' Duncane was in Amerciament of the court and the saide Johne
quhe quyt of his challance et cetera

The saide day It was statut ande ordanit be the prouest bailyeis ande
Counsale present for the tyme for the commone gude and weile of the
toune Inhabitans the samyn and for eschevin' of fyir' and Skatht cummand'
tharthrow that nayne eldin be haldin vndir ane Ruyf quhar fyir' is nor
in forbuthtis staris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoquarto die
mensis Augusti anno quo supra

Inquiscio / facto coram honorabili viro Johanne mar vno balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' In pretorio eiusdem
pro tribunali sedenti vicesimo octauo die mensis augusti anno dominj millesimo quingentesimo octauo per subscriptum
videlicet Andrea fyf patricium rede richardum Waus Johannem andirsone thomam meldrum
Duncanum fyf Alexandrum Kintor Andream michelsone Andream grig andream meldrum alexandrum
nory robertum Kennerty et thoma buchan burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
matland auunculus Jonete harpar latricis presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in futy inter terram
quondam thome glenmaluyn ex vna et terram quondam Johannis fecheat partibus ab altera
partibus ab altera et quod dicta Joneta est legitimus et propinquior heres eiusdem
quondam Johannis auunculj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et dicta terra valet'
nunc per annum quinque solidos Et valuit quadraginta denarios solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur
in capito de supremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in
manibus domini nostri regis legittime per se ipsum ob decessum quondam dicti Johannis per spacium duorum
mensium aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datis
et clausis sub sigillo dicti balliuj ac sigillis quorundam eorum quj Inquisicionj inter erant
faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo
die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day It was sufficientlie previt be certane famous personis
that Androu bawne had takin ane barsin pot furtht of Johnne frostaris
hous quhilk pott Johnne cuk officiar j tuk fra the said Androw for ane
pund of ane vnlaw ffor the quhilkis the sai Androw was in amerciament of the
court and aucht to restor the said pot agane to the said officiar'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in prtorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day Androw fif lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht Comperit tile ansuer' to
the borghe fundin one him be William Wormet for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of demi vnicorne and li' wax tharfor the balyeis chargit William scrimgeour
officiar' to pas' and tak ane Stres' of the saide Androw and lat it agane to borghe' to
the saide Androw and it be askit and warne him to Comper this day xv dais tile
ansuer to the said' borgh' as ferd day of proces'

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit y be the prouest balyeis and Counsale
present for the tyme that ale the baxtaris of this burghe sale baik xxx vnce
of Ry brede cleyne boutit sourit wele bakin fresche for tua d' and xv vnce
for j d' and xl vnce of vnboutit ry brede for ij d' and xx vnce for j d' with consent
and assent of the said' baxtaris vndir the payne of brekin of common ordinance

The said' day thome muresone was conuict' be his avne toung graunt for brekin
of the pas' in bakin of Ry bred'

head.add: the personis follouing graunt to pay for thir part of Symon elloun' woll

div.p:
The saide day thir pesonis eftir writin oblist tham be this handis vphaldin to pay
thir Somes of money to Symond' elloun or his factouris to the relevin of tham and
mathou branche for the Castin of ane sact' of wole of his et cetera Alexander Kintor to pay
ane punde gret Duncan Crak xviij s' g' Johne portar xviij s' g' Dauid
straloche xviij s' g' et Robert red' xviij s' g' vsuale money of
flaundris

Eodem die Dauid gedas' conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore Johannis Colisone prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio Andree lousone et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus bole fecit constituit creauit ordinauit Robertum hile suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuraotrem actorem
factorem ac nuncium specialem dans et concedens eidem suam integram potestatem ad petendum exigedum
et recipiendum ab alexandro blinsele vnam barrellam Salmonum ac vniuersa alia et singula bona ac
summas sibi debito et de receptis acquitandum Agendum prosequendum defendendum cuiumque omni alia
et singula faciendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato

The said' day It was fundin be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar that Johne
balgersche has mysgidit him in his langagis in banning and warning of Johne andirsone
and Androw litstar Ande ordanit him to forbeir' and gif euire he blasphemys tham or ony of tham
in tyme to Cum thai ordanit him to pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The said' day William myln' at the Justice myll' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' thomas
leslie forspekar for trubulance of Isabele bowar' et cetera and thai ordanit him to comper one friday that
next cumis to vndirlie the ordinance of the Counsale present for the tyme for amendis to be
maid' to hir'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirden' tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xv die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

head.add: the prising of fyve ringis and ane belt pertening to Willim serray litstar

div.p:
The said day Androu nauchtie ane of the officiaris of the said burgh' presentit
in the court fyve siluer ringis ande ane red tuscheay siluerit quhilk was deliuerit tile
him obefor be master Alexander bisset at command of the bailyeis' to be prisit for dettis
aving tile vmquhill William serray litstar quhilk ringis and tuscheay the said officiar Suffi
ciently preuit be diuers' famous' personis the gret aitht suorne was presentit thre
mercat dais obefor in the common mercat of the said burgh' in mercat tyme of day
and offerit tile ony maner of persone or personis that wald by thame and' the
nynt day of this Instant monetht of September as ferd day of proces' the said
officiar presentit the said ringis belt and tuscheay to the said mercat and offerit'
thaim diuers' tymis to sell and coud nocht comprehend nay persone to by thame tharfor
he causit alexander malisone ande robert hill burges of the said burgh' with the
auis' of Dauid theman goldsmitht be that aithtez' and' conscience pris' the
said ringis ande tuscheay quhilk prisit thame one this vis' the gilt ring for
fyve Inglis grotis wecht the ring with the blew stane half ane vncez' the
thravin ring for thre Inglis' grotis wecht ane litill ring for ane quartar
of ane vncez' of siluer the said tuscheay siluerit to tuelf s' and the signet ring
half ane vncez' of siluer quhilk prisin beand lauchfully preuit the bailyeis'
chargit the said officiar to caus' the belman to pas' throue the toune on
ane mercat day and the curat of the said burgh' tile Inqueir one ane sonday
in tyme of the hie mes' gif ony persone knew the said ringis and tuscheay and
quhome to thai pertene ande gif knawlagis tharof coude be gottin the said
officiar tile offer the samyne to the awnaris thai pay and tharfor to the creditor
the Somes aving tile him

The said' day thomas menyeis grauntit him pait of ane barrele of Salmonde aving to him
be Johne Kennerty

The said' day It was deliuirit be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar tht philp
clerk belman hed done wrang in the takin of the peris fra the murray men' In
the nayme of toll and Aw to Restoir' and deliuer the samyn agane Ande that the smale
Customaris aw to haue the custome of the said' peris becaus' thai come be sey and ale
that cumis be the sey aw to pay siclik to the smale Custom'

The saide day the balyeis ordanit ale the four' officiaris to bring ale pundis and distres'
takin be thame this yer' to the tolbutht eftir nowne that the amerciamentis mycht be modefeit
and Ilkan persone extentit eftir thar' demerite and faculte sua that the balyeis mycht be dischargit

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviii di mensis Septembris anno
quo supra

The said' day comperit sere John ruthirfurd' knicht ande opinly exponit and schew that
It was cumyn' to his knavlege that ane land pertening to him in heritage liand'
in the gastraw quhilk was vmquhile Cullannis was processit be certan
kirkmen' pretending thame to haue the propirte of the said' lande et cetera herfor j he tuk
him to preiwe the said lande euire strenyeabile for the annuell' ale termes bigan
Requirand' the prouest bailyeis and officiaris that thai wald' nocht proced' forthir
in the said matir and gif nat Sesin of the said' land' vnto the tyme he
warnit to comper befor thame for his defence

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abrdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem vicesimo secundo die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Johannem ruthirfurd thomam lesli thomam Waus' Duncanum
colisoun matheam branche Andream louson Dauid ruthirfurd Alexandrum malysone Willelmum
Kintor Duncanum fyf Willelmum colp Johannem moir cristoferum prat Alexandrum King et
Andream michelsone burgensem dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod gilberti menyeis' est legittimis
et propinquior heres quondam Dauid menyeis patris suj quj obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de croftis subscriptis

head.add: Compt of the myllar' of the Justice myllis' maid' of the expensis exponit of the samyn

div.p:
The said' day William makesone myllar' of the Justice myllis present his compt of the Costis
and expensis maid' be him one the bigin of said' myll' of the quhilk the tenor
follouis Item in the first tua Soullis to the quhelis of the nethir myln price viij s' Item
iiij burdis to cleitht the vthir quheile price viij' s' Item the savin of the said iiij burdis
price xij' d' Item the harnes of the tua quhelis cost ij' s' Item the extre the brig
the trindile braddis price vj s' Item the awis of the vthir quhelis price xij d' Item
the price of the trein nalis of the vthir quhelis price iiij d' Item iiij hundredth
Irne nalis to the quheile and the troiche price of the hundreth' naile xvj d'
Item vj schilles to big the spile with price of the peice iiij' s' Item the spurris and'
ane cloif to the said myln' price ij s' Item the thre stapillis price ij s' Item
iij stane plankis price ij s' Item the hoppir ande ane scho price ij s' Item ane
dusane of rachteris price vij s' Item for the savin of the said dusane rachteris
price ij s' et iij' d' Item the rod and the ringis price x d' Item in stane of Irne to
the spindile the ryne and the bandis the price of the spindill the ryne and' the
bandis makin xxvj d' Item for the roddis and' the bandis makin cost xxij d'
Item ij stanis to the myln' ane of fre stane price xx s' and the tothir of ane
crag stane price xij' s' Item for the stuyll bigin and ij' quhelis price xl s'
Williame belty Richeard Wricht and Thomas pery this is thar deliuerance abowne writin et cetera
Item for the changing of the gret tymmir to the nethir myln' price iij' s' Williame Abircherdyr
Johnne Andersone et James myln' this is thar deliuerance vndirwritin anence the bigin
of the tua houshis of the tua myllis Item in the first x s' of the nethir myln' in tymmir
faile and deuat Item viii s' in the vthir myln' in tymmir faile and devat and iij durris Item viij
s' in the barne in tymmir faile and devat Item xviij s' and iiij' d' in the hamebringin of
the watir in stane faile and tre Item to the nethir myln' dur' of burdis hongin with Irne
bandis price xxx d' Item the vthir myln' be the said Williame belty richeard Wricht
and thomas pery this is thar deliuerance in the mending of the samyn Item in the
first tua spullis to the quhelis price vij s' Item ij s' to cleitht the vthir quheile with burdis
Item viij scoir of naillis price of the hundretht xvj d' Item tua trindile breddis to the
said myln' price xij d' Item tua koggis and rvngis xij d' Item for Irne and warkman
schip to the bandis of the troiche price xvj d' Item the stuyle of the said myln is faly
and we can nocht Jug' it quhile It be bigit Item the makin of the tua quhelis to the
said myln' price vj s' viij' d' Item for roddis to the vthir myln' the Irne and making price
xvij s' Summa totius xij' li' xiiij s' ij d' les' Item this compt was maid befor
Johne' thomsone in the aldirmannis sted Item this was wat for yet quhile it was
Somet in poyntis of tar to the quheile and troiche price xviij d'

The said day Williame makesone myllar' of the Justice myllis Oblist him to refunde content
and pay to the chaplannis of the queir' of the saide burghe' aucht Schillingis betuix /
this and xv dais befor the fest of Sanct martin immediate eftir follouing the date of this
Act' and he pait tuelf s' the day of the making of this Act forsaid' to the said' chaplan
nis in haile and Complet pament of tua yeris maile of the saide myllis Occupeit be
the said myllar'

The saide day the prouest balyeis and Counsale with diuers' of the Communite present for the tyme
helde thame weile content and pait be the handis of William makesone that tennent
and myllar' of thar Justice myllis of thar fermes and malys of thar said' myllis
of the termes of tua yeris bigane In the Costis ande expensis maide and exponit one
the bigin of the samyn eftir the tenor of the saide Compt et cetera and for the pament of the
said' xxti s' to the said' chaplannis Ande dischargit the said' William tharof his
ayris executoris assignez' for thame and thar Successoris now and foreuire
